verbLexeme: 1. To go to shops and buy things. English = shop, go shopping.
nominalLexeme: 1. A building or part of a building where things are sold. English = shop, store.
2. The act of going to shops and buying things. English = shopping.
3. Things that you have bought at a shop. English = shopping.
4. A person who goes to a shop to buy things. English = shopper.
